mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Friends and acquaintances of: [a collection of funeral invitations from Clarksville, Tennessee, 1851-1854]
Funeral invitation
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hendrick, J. T. (John Thilman), 1815-1898
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 1851, July 3, James, son of Mr. and Mrs. Baird; services by Rev. Mr. Baldwin -- 1851, Aug. 22, Anna Conrad, infant daughter of Alfred and Mary E. Robb; services by Rev. J.T. Hendrick -- 1851, Aug. 27, Mr. William Dick; services by Rev. J.T. Hendrick -- 1851, Dec. 12, Sarah Elizabeth, infant daughter of Mr. & Mrs. R.M. House; services by the Rev. J.T. Hendrick. -- 1852, Jan. 24th: Jane, wife of Rev. J.T. Hendrick; services by the Rev. Dr. Edgar -- 1852, June 21, Eliza Jane, wife of Mr. G.G. Hinch; services by Rev. A.R. Irwin -- 1854, Jan. 30, Edward Howard.

Text of each is printed on p. [1] of a folded sheet, with a single black rule above and below the invitation. One is prefaced by the words "Funeral invitation." All pages have a black mourning border, but there is no text on p. [2]-[4] blank.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Baird, James, d. 1851--Death and burial.
